German here. I majored in History in High School and it was to much WW2 everybody hated the topic at the End because our teacher made it look like nothing happend in the World besides this.
We learned a lot about the freedom fighters in Germany besides the famous Staufenberg. One particular less known Man was [Gerog Elser](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johann_Georg_Elser) who tried to kill Hitler on the 8th November 1939. We watched a Play about him in School organized by People who wanted to make the Society more aware of him, because he was one of the first People who saw what Hitler is gonna do to the World, but he is not praised like Staufenberg. I definitely didn't understand why they praise Staufenberg so much here in the End he was a Nazi who had his own Motives.
That was interesting !

It's a great masterpiece that withstood time. What about you guys?

WRITING.TITLE: Do watch movies Dubbed or in their OV?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi everyone! Love this Subreddit and this awesome Community of Movie Lovers. I am a little bit off an outsider from my Friends, because most of them don't want to watch movies with me in their OV. I live in Germany and not all Movies get realesed in their OV in the Cinemas. I think that there is so must lost when a Film or Series get dubbed. I mean that for all languages! Really like to hear your Opinions.
I think two people had he same [Idea](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qjtQSMe0VeI)

WRITING.TEXT: In mostly every arc the SH split up in groups (duo but mostly trios). I really like when Nami and Usopp team up its always [funny!](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mlnn0hSVyRU). WRITING.TITLE: No Couples in One Piece?
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi everyone! Did you notice that in hole One Piece story there are no couples, like a married man and woman (or they are together)?
If you are a pirate you will leave your family (Yassop, Dragon, Gol D Roger, Devil Diaz) and if you were married Oda will kill your spouse or let them die (Queen Otohime, Zephyr's wife, Tom, Vivi's Mother, Robin's Father)
The only couple I know of are Sabo's Parents. Don't understand me wrong I don't need a love story in OP, but I think it's really interesting. Of all the main characters we know like the Supernova, the Yonko, the Admirals, the Vice-Admirals and the Shichibukai.
What do you think ?
[Orewa shirohige da](http://youtu.be/ieHGPMOSiOo?t=1m26s)

WRITING.TITLE: What do all Strawhats have in common?
WRITING.TEXT:
H everybody! First of all I wanted to say I find it suuuuper to find so many like-mindes OP Fans here, who love the series like I do. I've been reading OP for more then 10 years now and its been a ride :-)
So my question (or observation) is that the Strawhats have many things in common Such like everyone of them lost somebody really close to them before they joined the crew (maybe except for Sanji). Each of them has a dream that he only could achieve outside on the wide Ocean.
I think Jimbei really fit into the schematic, his dream could be to fulfill his promise to Ace and protect Luffy, that's one of the reasons why I think Rebecca is not gonna join the Crew, because her dream is (like Vivi) to rebuild here kingdom. But let me hear what you think, do they have more in common?
PS: You're all awesome!
If you could speak five languages, what would they be and why?
If you could speak five languages, what would they be and why?
